html:
Advanced 3D games Engines

You'll be using Unreal Engine 5, an industry standard ‘Games Engine’. The module will focus on expanding your knowledge from level 4, covering more advanced topics such as object orientation and using classes correctly. By the end of the module you should be able to make your own class hierarchies with complex functionality and implementation of mechanics. 

Learning Objectives:

+  Analyse existing systems to understand what approaches are currently taken and why.

+  Apply this theory in a manner which matches industry used methods to your own assets.

+  Problem solve scenarios given to you by both staff and issues you encounter during the making of your own assets.

+  Reflect on how effective your solutions are and know where you may need to improve. This includes being able to envisage how a system may expend and what you would need to change to allow for this.

Module Content:
